title: 11th Cat, Vol. 3
description: Rika and her uncle go on a magical journey looking for the inheritance her father had left behind. But once they arrive at the destination, it's quite different from what Rika remembers. This place is bloody scary, and on top of that, her uncle is now trying to kill her! What's going on? More of Rika's past is revealed in this third volume of the exciting adventures of Rika and Nomi.
author: Kim Mi-kyung
